com.example.bookflow.Util

类 FirebaseIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bookflow.Util.FirebaseIO

  • public class FirebaseIO
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that encapsulates the interaction with the Firebase Storage and Firebase Realtime Database. This is a singleton class.

      • getBook

        public void getBook(java.lang.String bookid,
                    com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener listener)
        get book async. User needs to provide a ViwEventListener that handles logic when book is available.
        参数:
        bookid -
        listener -

      • saveBook

        public void saveBook(Book mybook,
                     android.net.Uri localUri,
                     com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<java.lang.Void> listener)
        save the book information to firebase. This method fires a series of async tasks first check if the user has uploaded a photo. if so, upload the photo to Firebase Storage, and add the URI to Book
        参数:
        mybook - the book object to be saved
